org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat

Class BasicChromatogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.BasicChromatogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Chromatogram, Trace
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScfChromatogramImpl, ZTRChromatogramImpl

    public class BasicChromatogram
extends Object
implements Chromatogram
    BasicChromatogram is an implementation of Chromatogram that contains all the common base attributes of a Chroamtogram object. Subclasses may extend this class to add additional format specific methods.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • getPeakSequence

        public PositionSequence getPeakSequence()
        Description copied from interface: Chromatogram
        Get the PositionSequence of the peak positions from the trace scan positions in the trace file. The peaks are the positions that the basecaller determined are the scan points positions that are likely to be the bases.
        Specified by:
        getPeakSequence in interface Chromatogram
        Returns:
        a PositionSequence; will never be null.

      • getNumberOfTracePositions

        public int getNumberOfTracePositions()
        Description copied from interface: Chromatogram
        Get the number of actual trace scan positions in the trace file. Most Sanger Trace files have about 15,000 trace points.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfTracePositions in interface Chromatogram
        Returns:
